des: "This salad is sweet and simple - great for a BBQ or a pot luck and best when left to sit for an hour to let flavors meld."
ins: In a large bowl, mix together the carrots, pineapple and raisins. Stir in the honey, mayonnaise and lemon juice until evenly coated. Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving to let the flavors meld.
